snippet.title: Dragon Quest VII: Fragments of the Forgotten Past - Official Game Trailer - Nintendo E3 2016
snippet.description:
The legendary RPG series returns to Nintendo 3DS with Dragon Quest VII: Fragments of the Forgotten Past, check out to the official trailer from Nintendo E3 2016.

Check out more information here! http://e3.nintendo.com/games/dragon-quest-vii-3ds

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
